description:
Monitor agent performance metrics (success rate, token usage, response quality) and automatically suggest or apply temperature/max_tokens adjustments in agents.yaml based on usage patterns and outcomes.

**Rationale:** Users currently tweak agent configs through trial-and-error. Automated tuning based on actual performance data eliminates guesswork and optimizes cost/quality balance without manual experimentation.
title: Smart Default Agent Configuration Auto-tuning

descriptionHistory.description:
Monitor agent performance metrics (success rate, token usage, response quality) and automatically suggest or apply temperature/max_tokens adjustments in agents.yaml based on usage patterns and outcomes.

**Rationale:** Users currently tweak agent configs through trial-and-error. Automated tuning based on actual performance data eliminates guesswork and optimizes cost/quality balance without manual experimentation.
